questions.question_text: Who should be present to review and adjust the selected Sprint work if the Development Team determines that it will not be able to finish the complete forecast?

choices.D: The Scrum Master, the Business Analyst and the Development Team.
choices.C: The Development Team and Project Manager.
choices.B: The Product Owner and the Development Team.

questions.question_text: What Development Team structure is best suited to produce integrated increments?

choices.A: Every Development Team has the abilities to develop functionality from beginning to end throughout all technical layers.
choices.B: Each Development Team specializes in one technical layer of the system (e.g. GUI, database, middle tier, interfaces).

questions.question_text: Who determines how to do the work during the Sprint?

choices.A: Request a specialist to be added to the Development Team.
choices.D: Work with the Product Owner to determine what is possible and acceptable.
choices.C: Complete as much as possible and add the remaining work as a new Product Backlog item.
choices.B: Move the item to a future Sprint.

questions.question_text: What should a Development Team do if they don't understand a functional requirement?

choices.A: Require all teams in the organization to start using Scrum as soon as possible.
choices.F: Extend Retrospectives to include formal training.
choices.D: Penalize any Scrum Team members who are not staying within the Scrum Framework.
choices.B: Arrange 1:1 coaching sessions to discuss any identified concerns Steven may have.
choices.E: Educate stakeholders and clients about Scrum.

questions.answer_description: The Scrum Master serves the organization in several ways, including: Leading and coaching the organization in its Scrum adoption; Planning Scrum implementations within the organization; Helping employees and stakeholders understand and enact Scrum and empirical product development.
questions.question_text:
Steven is a Scrum Master that was hired to help an organization, that is new to Scrum, understands and enacts Scrum effectively.
Which three activities would be acceptable? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCE
B C E are correct
B C E are my answer
